name: Mercure Correze La Seniorie

reviews.text: The hotel is situated in the very picturesque and charming town of Correze. My friend and I stayed for 2 nights in a room on the top floor which was very spacious and comfortable.
reviews.title: No night porter

description: Mercure Corrèze the Seniorie is located in the heart of Corrèze medieval village, 15 min Museum of President Jacques Chirac and the Massif des Monédières. Discover one of our 29 rooms of character, including 9 superior rooms and 2 standard rooms specially designed for persons with mobility in a majestic remains of the 19th century and former boarding school for girls.In a calm and relaxing, environment where the association of modern and tradition fits perfectly.
